code: const createProject=async(token,projectInfo)=>{let response=await fetch('http://localhost:3001/api/projects',{method:'POST',headers:{"accept":"application/json","content-Type":"application/json","authorization":"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:JSON.stringify(projectInfo)});console.log(projectInfo);if(response.ok){const data=await response.json();return data.body;}else if(response.status===400){const error=await response.json();throw new Error(error.message);}else{throw new Error("An unidentified error occurred. Please, check the connection to the server and try again.");}};export default createProject;
